ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
ygData.msgSnippet: Last time I checked, while we have that 2HS catagory on our skills list we cant actually USE it.  I suggest doing both piercing and 1HS though.  There are alot
ygData.messageBody:
Last time I checked, while we have that 2HS catagory on our skills list we
cant actually USE it. I suggest doing both piercing and 1HS though. There
are alot of VERY nice piercers out there, and trust me... training it later
is a pain in the butt.

As for songs, twisting is ALWAYS a good idea, but what to twist is very
personal... for example, I shy away from AoE songs myself... which includes
the level 2 song. What you described doing sounds very much like what I did
at your level.

Liani Mistweaver
Songweaver of the 27th measure
Bristlebane Shard

-----Original Message-----
From: Sigma111 <sigma7@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, March 24, 2000 10:45 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...


>From: "Sigma111" <sigma7@...>
>
>
>Ok, for those who missed the last post, I am a level 7, almost 8 bard.
>Right now I am using a regular Long Sword. Not too dramatic..:)
>
>I know I get dual wield at 17, and that sounds nice but I was wondering
>what it maxes out at and if its better to get dual wield for 2 1h slashers
>or to invest in a 2h slasher like a bibs?
>
>thanks!
>
>Cerulia
>Bard of 7.8 songs, Fennin Ro
>
>
